definitions.definition: ( music ) A theatrical work , combining drama , music , song and sometimes dance .
( music ) The score for such a work.
( music ) The genre of such works, the art of composing operas.
A building designed for the performance of such works; an opera house .
A company dedicated to performing such works.
( by extension ) Any showy , melodramatic or unrealistic production resembling an opera.

main_definition: ( music ) A theatrical work , combining drama , music , song and sometimes dance .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) The score for such a work.
( music ) The genre of such works, the art of composing operas.
A building designed for the performance of such works; an opera house .
A company dedicated to performing such works.
( by extension ) Any showy , melodramatic or unrealistic production resembling an opera.

definitions.definition: plural of opus ; a collection of work.

main_definition: plural of opus ; a collection of work.
